quotes.quote: A human being is so irreplaceable. So valuable and so unique.
Time is more valuable than money, because time is irreplaceable.
One shouldn't gamble with what is irreplaceable and precious.
Time alone is irreplaceable. Waste it not.
Family is always irreplaceable, even when they're also irreconcilable.
If you don't make yourself irreplaceable, somebody will replace you. Being different is being remembered. Being the same is being forgotten.
Every instant of our lives is essentially irreplaceable: you must know this in order to concentrate on life.
To be irreplaceable, you have to be different.
The loss of life will be irreplaceable.
Fathers have a unique and irreplaceable role in the lives of children.
Old friends die on you, and they're irreplaceable. You become dependent.

The way to be irreplaceable is to become a social innovator. Start projects that motivate you to save the world and simultaneously make you money (and create mindshare) for your company. Social innovation makes magic happen.
The lack of wealth is easily repaired but the poverty of the soul is irreplaceable.
There are highlights when you become irreplaceable as a model, like when you become a muse to designers. They look at you differently; you're not a coat hanger for hire.
Don't waste your time, it is too short, Valuable and irreplaceable.
Art is an irreplaceable way of understanding and expressing the world.
